Detailed Description

Defines a dummy Producer implementation that adds some random data to the event.

Definition at line 41 of file DummyProducer.cxx.

References ldmx::SimParticle::getEnergy(), ldmx::SimParticle::setEnergy(), and ldmx::SimParticle::setPdgID().

                                               {
                std::cout << "DummyProducer: Analyzing an event!" << std::endl;

                int np = random_.Poisson(nParticles_);
                for (int i = 0; i < np; i++) {
                    SimParticle* a = (SimParticle*) tca_->ConstructedAt(i);
                    do {
                        a->setEnergy(random_.Gaus(aveEnergy_, 1.0));
                    } while (a->getEnergy() < 0);
                    a->setPdgID(i + 1);
                }
                event.add("simParticles", tca_);
            }
